data.title: The 7th International Conference on Hyperacusis and Misophonia

data.text:
Hilton Warsaw City

Grzybowska 63, Warsaw

https://www.hilton.com/en/hotels/wawhihi-hilton-warsaw-city/

Hilton Warsaw City is a business hotel and conference center located in the downtown business district in Warsaw. It has a spacious conference area including the largest ballroom in Warsaw, and the airy foyer and open-air area providing comfortable exhibition and catering space.

It can be easily reached by air, train, and car: a 15-minute drive from the Warsaw Frederic Chopin Airport and a 5-minute drive from the Warsaw Centralna railway station.

Major tourist attractions located within a 3 km distance include the Old Town Market Place, the Royal Castle, the POLIN Museum, the Museum of Warsaw Uprising, and numerous meeting and dining opportunities.

World Hearing Center

Mokra 17, Kajetany

http://whc.ifps.org.pl/

The World Hearing Center combines the ultramodern research center, hospital, and teaching & conference facilities under one roof. It is a unique, first-of-its-kind institution on the international scale: a modern ENT hospital providing the highest quality medical care and superb research, training, and conference center running a wide range of research and educational activities, including training of the specialists from the entire world in the fields of medicine, clinical engineering, speech therapy, deaf education, and psychology.

The WHC is located in a beautiful wooded area 25 km from the Warsaw city center, providing a relaxing natural ambiance for healing, research, and learning.

The Organizers will provide shuttles between the Hilton Warsaw City and the World Hearing Center.
